title: Doctors to launch token strike
content: The Government Medical Officersâ€™ Association (GMOA) has decided to stage a one-day token strike on February 21 (Monday).The token strike is scheduled to be staged at government hospitals across the island on Monday.During a press briefing in Colombo today, the GMOA accused the incumbent government of going even further than the previous administration in violating the national wage policies.
